title: Live Stream API - Before you begin
abstract:
# Live Stream API - Before you begin
This page shows how to create a Google Cloud project, enable the Live Stream API, create [authentication credentials](/livestream/docs/authentication) , and grant your account one or more [IAM roles](/livestream/docs/access-control#roles) .
content: ## Create a project**Note:** Add the IAM role `roles/storage.admin` to your Google account for more control over your project's Cloud Storage buckets.
